job.title: Data Scientist (Remote)
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtltugtdata scientist remoteltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtour pharmamed device client based out of massachusetts is looking to hire a junior to midlevel data scientist for a remote opportunity this role starts as a contract but has the potential to go full time unfortunately our client is not able to sponsor at this time so w candidates are encouraged to applyltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtthe right candidate will possessltpgtltulgtltligt years of experience serving as a data scientistbi developerltligtltligtexperience taking raw data and transforming it into visualizationinsights for smesltligtltligtexperience with salesforcecom marketing cloud and a knowledge of conversion funnel using sfdcltligtltligtexperience with bi tools such as tableau or spotfire a mustltligtltligtscripting languages such as python r or matlabltligtltligtability to write and run sql database queriesltligtltligtexperience in data wrangling data cleaning and machine learningltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtfor immediate consideration please send your most recent resume toampnbspmsalemifootbridgeconsultingcomampnbspltpgt
